trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event occurs after a form is closed, either by the user, through the user interface (UI), or programmatically, through calls to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> class, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>사용자 인터페이스 (UI)를 통해 또는 프로그래밍 방식으로 같은 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>클래스 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application>클래스</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application> 에서</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Exit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.Close%2A> 메서드 호출을 통해 사용자가 중 하나는 폼이 닫힌 후 이벤트 발생</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: If a form has any child or owned forms, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event is also raised for each one.
trans-unit.target: 모든 자식 또는 소유 된 폼을 폼에는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>이벤트는 또한 각각에 대해 발생 합니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The FormClosedEventArgs class provides data for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed> event.
trans-unit.target: FormClosedEventArgs 클래스에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>이벤트.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.FormClosed>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property provides the reason why the form is being closed.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs"></xref> class.
The `closeReason` parameter is used to initialize the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosedEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property.
A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"></xref> value that represents the reason why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.CloseReason"> </xref> 폼을 닫는 이유를 나타내는 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates why the form was closed.
trans-unit.target: 폼을 닫은 이유를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form> can be closed because of a variety of reasons, both user-initiated and programmatic.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>다양 한 이유로, 사용자가 시작한 방법과 프로그래밍 방식으로 닫힐 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormClosingEventArgs.CloseReason%2A> property indicates the reason for the closure.
